flavor: The odd creatures around you are covered in soft flesh instead of chitin, and they exude a delicious scent. What more can you learn about them? Does their lack of ties to clutch and pack worry you? They might be untrustworthy. Why do they lie down and close their eyes for hours on end? Perhaps they are weak or lazy. Is it even possible for these creatures to be worthwhile clutchmates?
name: Explorer Of The World
